text:
Inland Fisheries (Districts) Order 1996

I make the following order under section 9 of the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

23 May 1996

T. JOHN CLEARY

Minister for Inland Fisheries

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Inland Fisheries (Districts) Order 1996 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 31 May 1996.

3. Interpretation
    In this order –
        Act means the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

4. Declaration of districts
        (1) The areas of land specified in Schedules 1 , 2 and 3 to this order are declared to be districts for the purposes of section 9 of the Act.
        (2) Those districts are named respectively –
                (a) the district of the Southern Tasmanian Licensed Anglers' Association; and
                (b) the district of the North-Western Fisheries Association; and
                (c) the district of the Northern Tasmanian Fisheries Association.

SCHEDULE 1 - The district of the Southern Tasmanian Licensed Anglers' Association

Clause 4

All that area of land in Tasmania south of a line of latitude through Antill Ponds to the east and west coasts of Tasmania.

SCHEDULE 2 - The district of the North-Western Fisheries Association

Clause 4

All that area of land in Tasmania west of a straight line from a point on the high-water mark on Bass Strait at Badger Head to the point where the Ouse River intersects the northern boundary of the district of the Southern Tasmanian Licensed Anglers' Association.

SCHEDULE 3 - The district of the Northern Tasmanian Fisheries Association

Clause 4

All that area of land in Tasmania not included in the district of the Southern Tasmanian Licensed Anglers' Association or in the district of the North-Western Fisheries Association.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 May 1996

This order is administered in the Department of Environment and Land Management.
